archimate:Requirement.name: MA-4(4): Nonlocal Maintenance | Authentication and Separation of Maintenance Sessions
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Protect nonlocal maintenance sessions by: (a) Employing [Assignment: organization-defined authenticators that are replay resistant]; and (b) Separating the maintenance sessions from other network sessions with the system by either: (1) Physically separated communications paths; or (2) Logically separated communications paths.

properties.value: Communications paths can be logically separated using encryption.
